data.title: Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services
data.meta_description: Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services is a fully integrated contract development and manufacturing organization with sites in Belgium, United States, Japan and India providing comprehensive process development services, cGMP manufacturing and drug product fill finish services of small molecule and biologic APIs and intermediates. Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services offers a broad range of innovative platforms and capabilities to rapidly scale from clinical and pilot programs to commercial quantities, including: Crystalomics® and Corynex® technologies, oglionucleotide synthesis, antibody drug conjugations (ADC), high potency APIs (HPAPI), aseptic fill finish, continuous flow manufacturing and more. Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services is dedicated to providing a high level of quality and service to meet our client’s needs.
data.text:
Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services is a fully integrated contract development and manufacturing organization with sites in Belgium, United States, Japan and India providing comprehensive process development services, cGMP manufacturing and drug product fill finish services of small molecule and biologic APIs and intermediates.

Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services offers a broad range of innovative platforms and capabilities to rapidly scale from clinical and pilot programs to commercial quantities, including: Crystalomics®​ and Corynex®​ technologies, oglionucleotide synthesis, antibody drug conjugations (ADC), high potency APIs (HPAPI), aseptic fill finish, continuous flow manufacturing and more. Ajinomoto Bio-Pharma Services is dedicated to providing a high level of quality and service to meet our client’s needs.
